Package de.db.derpate.util

Interface HashUtil

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SHA256Util
    public interface HashUtil
    This interface provides methods that are normally used with hash algorithms. It ensures, that hash algorithms in the software can be easily replaced, if needed.
    Author:
    MichelBlank

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String hash​(java.lang.String unhashed, byte[] salt, byte[] pepper, java.lang.String hashseperator)
      Hashes a String with a given salt and pepper
      java.lang.String hash​(java.lang.String unhashed, int length, byte[] pepper, java.lang.String hashseperator)
      Hashes a String with a given pepper and generates a random salt with the given length
      boolean isEqual​(java.lang.String unhashed, java.lang.String hashed, byte[] pepper, java.lang.String hashseperator)  

    • Method Detail

      • hash

        java.lang.String hash​(java.lang.String unhashed,
                      byte[] salt,
                      byte[] pepper,
                      java.lang.String hashseperator)
        Hashes a String with a given salt and pepper
        Parameters:
        unhashed - unhashed String
        salt - salt to use
        pepper - pepper to use
        hashseperator - character used to separate salt and hash
        Returns:
        hash as String

      • hash

        java.lang.String hash​(java.lang.String unhashed,
                      int length,
                      byte[] pepper,
                      java.lang.String hashseperator)
        Hashes a String with a given pepper and generates a random salt with the given length
        Parameters:
        unhashed - unhashed String
        length - length of the salt to be used. Should be at lest 32 (Bytes).
        pepper - pepper to use
        hashseperator - character used to separate salt and hash
        Returns:
        hash as String

      • isEqual

        boolean isEqual​(java.lang.String unhashed,
                java.lang.String hashed,
                byte[] pepper,
                java.lang.String hashseperator)
        Parameters:
        unhashed - unhashed String, the hashed String should be compared to
        hashed - hashed String with salt
        pepper - pepper
        hashseperator - character used to separate salt and hash
        Returns:
        true, if unhashed String can be hashed to equal the hashed string;false, if unhashed String is not equal to what the hashed string formerly was
